content:
I have just put this PR #18011 out for review. It depends on #17986 (though only in a rather superficial way).

Any feedback on either PR would be gratefully received.

I expect these should be my last two PRs to Mathlib3 (except perhaps those which are driven by the port to Lean 4).
This PR #18011 is now dependency-free. No pressure to review but it might be a nice result to squeeze into 2022 ;-)
